title: Wow riot rank system
body:
THIS IS BS TO THE MAX. 
I was b5 last seaon, i know what youre thinking how shit xD. 
but anyway i thought this was my chance to redeem myself. so i played my ranked and won 7/10 of the games. meaning only lost 3.
THEN I GET BRONZE 5. 
RIOT DO YOU WANT EVERYONE TO HATE YOU CAUSE IM PISSED I WASTED MY TIME!!!

replies.body: The reason this happens is due to the mmr of not only you, but your team and the enemy team. If you win games and have people on your team with a plat elo, against those of a bV elo, then the win is worth less. Still, sucks that you didn't get b1 at least

Yeah it's a complete mess not to mention the massive increase of trolls and afkers. How are we meant to climb out of divisions with these types of players in every game??? Punishments need to be more severe for afking/trolling in a ranked game.
If you are good you will ascend to your appropriate level of skill.
Absolute joke, won 6/10 and got bronze 5, was bronze 3 last season.
My friend lost all 10 of his games and Fed in 8 of them and got silver 5, i win 5/10 of mine and get bronze 5.....................
I had 8/10 games and my support games when I won I had like S and A rankings, please riot..
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/20092560 My complaint directly to riot is here
i got 7/10 1st year, gold silver 4, 2nd year got 9/10 got b5. Said "fuck the system" went to gold
Had the same thing here man!!!
dude! I won 10/10 of my placement games and im still bronze V. You're not alone !
100%  1st match in preliminary matchs teamed up with nubs and against much higher skill level player/team what a joke!
